trans-unit.source: Specifies the properties that are in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica le proprietà in un <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A StylusPointDescription specifies which properties are associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica di una StylusPointDescription quali proprietà sono associate a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: For each property in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, the StylusPointDescription contains a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> object which specifies constraints such as the minimum and maximum values of the property.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni proprietà in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>, alla StylusPointDescription contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>oggetto che specifica i vincoli, ad esempio i valori minimo e massimi della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> methods to check for these properties in the StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A>metodi per verificare la presenza di queste proprietà alla StylusPointDescription.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetPropertyInfo%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.HasProperty%2A>

trans-unit.source: All <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> must share the same StylusPointDescription.
trans-unit.target: Tutti <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>devono condividere la stessa StylusPointDescription.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you try to add a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that has a different StylusPointDescription, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se si tenta di aggiungere un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>per un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>che dispone di una StylusPointDescription diversa, verrà generata un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that contains information for the properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>che contiene informazioni per le proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: You must pass in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects for the properties, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario passare <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>oggetti per le proprietà, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: A generic IEnumerable of type <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> that specifies the properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un IEnumerable generico di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> che specifica le proprietà di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> oggetti sono identici.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> objects are compatible if they contain the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects in the same order.
trans-unit.target: Due <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>oggetti compatibili se contengono lo stesso <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>oggetti nello stesso ordine.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> da controllare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> da controllare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects are identical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> gli oggetti sono identici; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the intersection of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'intersezione dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: `StylusPointDescription1` and `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` may have a common property, yet the constraints specified in their respective <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> objects differ.
trans-unit.target: `StylusPointDescription1`e `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo` potrebbe essere una proprietà comune, ma i vincoli specificati nelle rispettive <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>oggetti diversi.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the constraints differ, the GetCommonDescription method uses the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> from `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.
trans-unit.target: Se i vincoli sono diversi, il metodo GetCommonDescription utilizza il <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>da `stylusPointDescriptionPreserveInfo`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> da intersecare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> da intersecare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> that contains the properties that are present if both of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> che contiene le proprietà presenti in entrambi dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> per la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> that specifies the property of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> che specifica la proprietà dell'oggetto desiderato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le proprietà del <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta che contiene tutte le <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo"> </xref> gli oggetti il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> ha la proprietà specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> to check for in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref> per verificare la presenza nel <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> has the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> è stato specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> è un subset dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> against which to check whether the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> per verificare se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> è un subset.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> is a subset of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> è un subset dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di proprietà di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of properties in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di proprietà di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>.
